attributes.action: Call on David Cameron to reconsider his resignation.
attributes.background: David Cameron resigned as PM following the result of the referendum. Many of us may never have supported him or voted to remain, including myself but the country has lost a passionate charismatic and competent leader so important for our country now.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned. The UK Government or Parliament cannot stop a Minister resigning.
